name: biomni-query-pride
title: Biomni: Query Pride
description: Query PRIDE Archive for mass spectrometry-based proteomics data and protein identifications.
content:
Overview

Searches PRIDE Archive, the world largest proteomics repository containing mass spectrometry experiments, protein identifications, PTMs, and quantitative proteomics data.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query
  • endpoint (string, optional): PRIDE endpoint
  • max_results (integer, optional): Maximum results

Biological Use Case

Critical for proteomics research and PTM studies. Researchers use PRIDE to find datasets, validate identifications, study modifications, compare expression, and reanalyze published data.

Output

Returns JSON (pride_results.json) with project info, accessions, descriptions, species, tissues, instruments, identifications, PTMs, and download links.

Category

database
